documents.document: @ultshanator @JonHeyman 10/5 rights, plus I bet he would want the club to pick up his option..and that might screw the deal right there
@JonHeyman I would do that deal with the Cardinals
@jaysfan9293 @JonHeyman Well that's the question..sell what? Our pending free agents won't get us much.
@david_draper10 @kdog_NL @JonHeyman Pipe dreams favourite argument? Anything can happen.. lmao
@kdog_NL @JonHeyman I don't need the false hope of a second wild card spot to prevent a perfect opportunity that would benefit this franchise for the future
@TheToughBretts @thejaysnation @AndrewStoeten Positives!
@kdog_NL @JonHeyman So you expect the Jays to play 20 games above .500 ball in the second half?
@JonHeyman They can't disrupt the "awakened fanbase" has been the narrative lately. Well if they keep losing it will happen anyways. Sell
@Wilnerness590 Enjoy your break
@gregorMLB Keep playing like this and they won't have to worry about the "awakened fan base" from 2015 till now. They'll be gone
@Wilnerness590 Jays fans who showed up in 2015 https://t.co/PpFu34qmr6
@ari_shapiro Shades of Vernon Wells putting up numbers when the game was out of reach
@BarryDavis_ Rebuild and piss off a fanbase that has come out since 2015 Continue with this group, wallowing in mediocrity, slowing lose that fanbase.hmm
@Wilnerness590 If there was ever a day to tune into Jays therapy, it will be today. Can't wait Mike lmao
@BarryDavis_ Why are people even entertaining trading a young 2b that's often injured. What MLB team takes that on right now? Lol
@BarryDavis_ Cry because we don't sign free agents, also cry that we over payed when they don't perform. LF - injuries to Alford and Dalton didn't help
@BarryDavis_ To suddenly lose command and issue so many walks in a short stretch.. wondered if his back flared up
@AndrewStoeten Can't live and die on every game in a baseball season. You'll drive yourself nuts
@ari_shapiro Quite a few blowouts in a short stretch
@ari_shapiro While taking a series against arguably the best team in the AL is encouraging, the Jays need to string together more the a few series wins
@Wilnerness590 @FAN590 Everyone back on the bandwagon
@kevenbanks17 @ari_shapiro @BlueJays Feast or famine
@ari_shapiro https://t.co/SgZuXyjzLM
@ari_shapiro Jk lol hopefully this offence gets going for real
@ari_shapiro Its like that partner you threaten to break up with,suddenly they start acting like it used to be, but we all know it doesn't last for long.
@ari_shapiro Hopefully this isn't a tease job

@ari_shapiro Prospect porn
@ari_shapiro So is this what Shapiro means by "window of competitiveness"?
@Baseball_Jenn Maybe a fastball in the butt might clear up this misunderstanding between teams
@Mauerback @Wilnerness590 At least they can do that well
@Wilnerness590 Too bad we aren't good right now. It would be a nice rivalry
@ari_shapiro I'm curious what the big Dome renovation will entail..though I wish the team would be instead
@ari_shapiro Relax everyone, Wilner says it's still early
@ari_shapiro Nothing a deadline trade won't help
@ari_shapiro We used to destroy high fastballs.. seems so long ago :(
@lloydpparsons @ari_shapiro Imagine they blew it up knowing full well the dome was basically sold out in sept

@lloydpparsons @ari_shapiro I'm dedicated, just share a longer term view then most
@ari_shapiro The sacrifices we make for more home runs ;p
@ari_shapiro Just no blisters please
@HunterAtkins35 Can we stop with the no emotion, robot style "old school" baseball bullshit?
@mav_five @Ken_Rosenthal Moving Donaldson and Haap would set us up nicely (theoretically)

@CNN https://t.co/HYAu4p6llq
@CNN Russian headlines is big $$$ for CNN..
@mav_five @Ken_Rosenthal Agree 100%. But when a media company owns the team, selling hope to keep butts in the seats is more important then realistic opportunities
@Ken_Rosenthal Selling just enough hope to keep the fans in the seats and watching on tv..but not enough reality to contend
@ScottyMacThinks @ScottyMacThinks crowds are great but will they be here in two seasons if this team stays the way they are now? And we missed an opptunity
@ari_shapiro @jgoldstrass Lol, I know rebuilds aren't a guarantee..or free agent retools for that matter..the big club performing to their career averages solves it
@ari_shapiro @jgoldstrass Good discussion. Fair and logical... still doesn't put my mind at ease :p
@ari_shapiro @jgoldstrass I'll listen now
@ari_shapiro Good question I heard on the radio just now, is the business of baseball hindering what the Jays can do moving forward?
@ari_shapiro And just pathetically wallowing in the bottom third of the league pretending to have a shot at the 2nd wildcard for 4 months of a seaon
@ari_shapiro I don't want them to a field a team of aging fan favourites based on ratings and "the awakening of baseball fans" ....
@ari_shapiro It is a loaded question, especially when you factor in the owner being in the media business
@ari_shapiro Seriously, ask yourself, what does this team do well, average and what are they absolutely terrible at? Then you'll have your answer
@ari_shapiro Yankees had been struggling almost as bad as the Jays recently. Something had to give between the two teams
@Wilnerness590 Does InfoWars have a sports reporter?
@AndrewStoeten Lol
@Buster_ESPN do you think it would be a mistake for the Jays not to get ahead of this rebuild instead of "retooling" a slow old core?

@DanRiccio590 (2)..like the Phillies back 2010 and on.. against core they kept adding to only to finish 3rd with the Mets, Marlins and Braves in their ...
@DanRiccio590 I think rebuild talk steams from the fear that if we don't get ahead of it, we stand a chance at turning out ....
@Wilnerness590 (2). Cubs philosophy or just the best player at the time and see where the chips fall with development?
@Wilnerness590 draft question.. while the pervious regime drafted pitchers predominantly, is there a focus on position players.....

@ari_shapiro Knack for scoring clutch goals. Rebuild is over apparently. Let's get it
